remarks: Define 'less than' on the set of extended reals.  Definition 12-3.1 of [Gleason] p. 173.  Note that in our postulates for complex numbers, ` <RR ` is primitive and not necessarily a relation on ` RR ` . (Contributed by NM, 13-Oct-2005.)
statement:
df-ltxr $p |- < = ( { <. x , y >. | ( x e. RR /\ y e. RR /\ x <RR y ) } u. ( ( ( RR u. { -oo } ) X. { +oo } ) u. ( { -oo } X. RR ) ) ) $.
$d x y $.
